title: RowFormatter JSON
description: JSON object that defines row in 'List' and 'Compact List' layout.

hideSelection.description: If true, then selection UX in 'List' and 'Compact List' layout will be disabled. Ignored if there is no rowFormatter defined.

hideColumnHeader.description: If true, then the list column header UX in in 'List' and 'Compact List' layout will be hidden.

rowFormatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting of a row.

additionalRowClass.description: CSS class(es) that is applied to the entire row. Supports expressions. Only valid for 'List' and 'Compact List' layouts.

groupProps.description: Specify the group header and footer formatters

headerFormatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting for the group headers

hideFooter.description: Boolean value to hide the group footer

footerFormatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting for the group footers

hideFooter.description: Boolean value to hide the list footer

footerFormatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting for the list footer
